events.comment: Enemy state 0 is idle, not attacks. After every major attack allows 2 second cool down and return to standard attacking 1
Enemy standard attack mode aka 1. Fire randomnly every 1-5 seconds
Attack state 2. Enemy sprays bulletts in a circle for 2 seconds
Enemy State 3 Rotates 90 degrees fires once
Attack 4 Fire in opposites direction twice.
bullets colide with shield they die
